extends UserAuthenticator

      • setPassword

        public boolean setPassword(EntityPrincipal entityPrincipal,
                           java.lang.String password,
                           int expires)
        Sets the Account Password which is stored in a separate getTable for security
        Parameters:
        entityPrincipal - The Account to set password for
        password - The password to set
        expires - The password expiration. Use -1 for no expiration
        Returns:
        True if we successfully set the password
